sense.def: Pathological Condition of an acute state of xu lao 虛勞 , depletion exhaustion, with apparent internal heat. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 27: 急勞，四肢煩熱，百節酸疼，口乾心躁，小便黃 赤，不欲飲食 , “ Acute exhaustion : the four limbs are affected by vexing heat. All joints ache. The mouth is dry and the heart is restless. The urine is yellow-red. [Patients] have no appetite”.
